mapper.select: select wt.id, wt.name from dj_core_house_flow hf,dj_core_worker_type wt where hf.state = 0 and hf.work_type = 4 and hf.work_steta != 2 and hf.worker_type > 3 and hf.house_id=#{houseId} and wt.id = hf.worker_type_id order by hf.sort asc
SELECT name from dj_core_worker_type where type=#{type}

SELECT cwt.type, cwt.sort FROM dj_core_house_flow chf LEFT JOIN dj_house h ON chf.house_id = h.id LEFT JOIN dj_core_worker_type cwt ON chf.worker_type = cwt.type where h.member_id = #{memberId} AND chf.work_steta in (0,1,4)
